name: Rocky Incline
description:
You're standing on a rocky incline. The sand here is mixed with small rocks of various sizes and the water crashes against a cliff face a dozen feet below you. To the southeast you can see a lighthouse built atop a tall column of rock a little ways out into the ocean.
To the west, you could head down the slope to the white, sandy beach. To the east, the incline continues steeply upward.
